title: Season 1: Building Model IQ Foundations
theme: Introduction to Model Selection and Azure AI
description: Season 1 introduces the Model Mondays format and covers foundational topics in model selection, evaluation, and deployment using Microsoft Foundry and GitHub Models.

title: Season 2: Advanced Model Techniques
theme: Deep Dive into Reasoning, Multimodal, and Specialized Models
description: Season 2 explores advanced topics including reasoning models, multimodal AI, model customization, and real-world customer implementations.

title: Season 3: Models for Beginners Integration
theme: Learning Through Practice with Models for Beginners Curriculum
description: Season 3 integrates structured learning with the Models for Beginners curriculum, featuring weekly lessons alongside spotlights on Microsoft Ignite announcements and practical implementations.
